text.0: like waves of waters skilled in song the juices of the soma speed.
text.2: with stream of sacrifice the brown bright drops have flowed with strength in store.
text.3: of kine into the wooden vats.
text.4: to indra vāyu varuṇa to viṣṇu and the maruts flow.
text.5: the drops of soma juice effused.
text.6: three several words are uttered kine are owing cows who give their milk.
text.8: the young and sacred mothers of the holy rite have uttered praise.
text.9: they decorate the child of heaven.
text.10: from every side o soma for our profit pour thou forth four seas.
